seg-source.mrk: Display the Agents View

target.mrk: Afficher la vue Agents

trans-unit.source: In the , select > Agents > Main View.

seg-source.mrk: In the , select > Agents > Main View.

target.mrk: Dans la , sélectionnez > Agents > Vue principale.

trans-unit.source: The agents view enables to manage the agent parameters (<MadCap:xref href="#Agent_view_description" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: The agents view enables to manage the agent parameters (<MadCap:xref href="#Agent_view_description" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>).

target.mrk: La vue des agents permet de gérer les paramètres des agents (<MadCap:xref href="#Agent_view_description" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Host name

target.mrk: Nom d'hôte

trans-unit.source:
Displays as the agent identifier as declared on the server. Generally, the agent identifier is identical to the computer name. If the computer name already exists e.g. on a machine in a different domain, adds a suffix in the form -nnn (from 000 to 999). To use a dedicated agent identifier when creating a new agent, see Agent to Server Access Configuration.
The agent identifier can be modified by double clicking the agent in the Agent Details window.

seg-source.mrk: Displays as the agent identifier as declared on the server.
Generally, the agent identifier is identical to the computer name.
If the computer name already exists e.g. on a machine in a different domain, adds a suffix in the form -nnn (from 000 to 999).

To use a dedicated agent identifier when creating a new agent, see <MadCap:xref href="Configure_Agent_to_Server_Access.htm#aln_installation_common_92844061_1058914" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Agent to Server Access Configuration</MadCap:xref>.
The agent identifier can be modified by double clicking the agent in the Agent Details window.

target.mrk: Affiche l'identifiant de l'agent tel que déclaré sur le serveur.
Généralement, l'identifiant de l'agent est identique au nom de l'ordinateur.
Si le nom de l'ordinateur existe déjà, par exemple sur une machine dans un domaine différent, ajoute un suffixe sous la forme-nnn (de 000 à 999).

Pour utiliser un identifiant d'agent dédié lors de la création d'un nouvel agent, voir <MadCap:xref href="Configure_Agent_to_Server_Access.htm#aln_installation_common_92844061_1058914" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Agent to Server Access Configuration</MadCap:xref>.
L'identifiant de l'agent peut être modifié en double-cliquant sur l'agent dans la fenêtre Détails de l'agent.

seg-source.mrk: Computer name

target.mrk: Nom de l'ordinateur

trans-unit.source: Name by which the agent is identified on the network. Frame background turns red when the computer raises an alarm.

seg-source.mrk: Name by which the agent is identified on the network.
Frame background turns red when the computer raises an alarm.

target.mrk: Nom par lequel l'agent est identifié sur le réseau.
L'arrière-plan du cadre devient rouge lorsque l'ordinateur déclenche une alarme.

seg-source.mrk: Quotas

target.mrk: Quotas

trans-unit.source: Indicates the percentage of quota used. See <MadCap:xref href="Customize_Data_Protection_Settings.htm#server_config_1507838811_1243001" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Creating a Data Protection Strategy</MadCap:xref> for details on how to set quotas.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the percentage of quota used.

See <MadCap:xref href="Customize_Data_Protection_Settings.htm#server_config_1507838811_1243001" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Creating a Data Protection Strategy</MadCap:xref> for details on how to set quotas.

target.mrk: Indique le pourcentage de quota utilisé.

Voir <MadCap:xref href="Customize_Data_Protection_Settings.htm#server_config_1507838811_1243001" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Creating a Data Protection Strategy</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails sur la façon de définir des quotas.

seg-source.mrk: Replication source name

target.mrk: Nom de la source de réplication

trans-unit.source: Name of the server being replicated on the current server.

seg-source.mrk: Name of the server being replicated on the current server.

target.mrk: Nom du serveur en cours de réplication sur le serveur actuel.

trans-unit.source: If you are viewing the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> from the replication source server (or if no replication is defined), this field is empty.

seg-source.mrk: If you are viewing the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> from the replication source server (or if no replication is defined), this field is empty.

target.mrk: Si vous affichez la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> à partir du serveur source de réplication (ou si aucune réplication n'est définie), ce champ est vide.

seg-source.mrk: Replication destination name

target.mrk: Nom de la destination de réplication

trans-unit.source: Name of the server to which the current server is replicated.

seg-source.mrk: Name of the server to which the current server is replicated.

target.mrk: Nom du serveur vers lequel le serveur actuel est répliqué.

trans-unit.source: If you are viewing the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> from the replication destination server (or if no replication is defined), this field is empty.

seg-source.mrk: If you are viewing the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> from the replication destination server (or if no replication is defined), this field is empty.

target.mrk: Si vous affichez la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> à partir du serveur de réplication cible (ou si aucune réplication n'est définie), ce champ est vide.

seg-source.mrk: Replication lag

target.mrk: Lag de réplication

trans-unit.source: Displays information regarding the replication of this agent. Synchronized means the agent has been correctly replicated to the target replication server.

seg-source.mrk: Displays information regarding the replication of this agent.
Synchronized means the agent has been correctly replicated to the target replication server.

target.mrk: Affiche des informations concernant la réplication de cet agent.
"Synchronisé" signifie que l'agent a été correctement répliqué sur le serveur de réplication cible.

seg-source.mrk: Last synchronization point replicated

target.mrk: Dernier point de synchronisation répliqué

trans-unit.source: Time of the last synchronization, i.e., last protection time of the replicated data.

seg-source.mrk: Time of the last synchronization, i.e., last protection time of the replicated data.

target.mrk: Heure de la dernière synchronisation, c'est-à-dire dernière heure de protection des données répliquées.

seg-source.mrk: Last connection

target.mrk: Dernière connexion

trans-unit.source: Time at which the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> last contacted the server.

seg-source.mrk: Time at which the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> last contacted the server.

target.mrk: Heure à laquelle l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> a contacté le serveur pour la dernière fois.

seg-source.mrk: Last synchronization

target.mrk: Dernière synchronisation

trans-unit.source: Time at which the last data to be protected was sent to the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server from the agent. The update of the Synchronization time consists of these steps:

seg-source.mrk: Time at which the last data to be protected was sent to the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server from the agent.
The update of the Synchronization time consists of these steps:

target.mrk: Heure à laquelle les dernières données à protéger ont été envoyées au serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> par l'agent.
La mise à jour du temps de synchronisation comprend les étapes suivantes :

trans-unit.source: Each time a protection session completes without any error i.e. all files and directories are protected, the Synchronization time is updated along with the Last session completed. If errors occur, for instance one file is missing, then the Last session completed time is updated, but not the Synchronization time.

seg-source.mrk: Each time a protection session completes without any error i.e.
all files and directories are protected, the Synchronization time is updated along with the Last session completed.
If errors occur, for instance one file is missing, then the Last session completed time is updated, but not the Synchronization time.

target.mrk: Chaque fois qu'une session de protection se termine sans erreur, c'est-à-dire que
tous les fichiers et répertoires sont protégés, l'heure de synchronisation est mise à jour avec la dernière session terminée.
Si des erreurs se produisent, par exemple si un fichier est manquant, alors l'heure de la dernière session terminée est mise à jour, mais pas l'heure de synchronisation.

trans-unit.source: If no files are modified at the time a session is supposed to occur (according to the RPO parameter) i.e. there is no new data to protect, the Synchronization time is updated nonetheless to indicate that data is protected. In that case, the session time (started and completed) are not updated.

seg-source.mrk: If no files are modified at the time a session is supposed to occur (according to the RPO parameter) i.e.
there is no new data to protect, the Synchronization time is updated nonetheless to indicate that data is protected.
In that case, the session time (started and completed) are not updated.

target.mrk: Si aucun fichier n'est modifié au moment où une session est censée avoir lieu (selon le paramètre RPO) c'est-à-dire qu'il
n'y a pas de nouvelles données à protéger, le temps de synchronisation est néanmoins mis à jour pour indiquer que les données sont protégées.
Dans ce cas, l'heure de la session (commencée et terminée) n'est pas mise à jour.

seg-source.mrk: E-mail

target.mrk: E-mail

trans-unit.source: Indicates the e-mail address provided by the user on the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agent. If this field is empty, the administrator has the ability to enter an e-mail address. This enables users to:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the e-mail address provided by the user on the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agent.
If this field is empty, the administrator has the ability to enter an e-mail address.
This enables users to:

target.mrk: Indique l'adresse e-mail fournie par l'utilisateur sur l'agent <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Si ce champ est vide, l'administrateur a la possibilité de saisir une adresse e-mail.
Cela permet aux utilisateurs de :

trans-unit.source: Connect to the Web restore application and receive the web restore code to restore data.

seg-source.mrk: Connect to the Web restore application and receive the web restore code to restore data.

target.mrk: Se connecter à l'application de restauration Web et recevoir le code de restauration Web pour restaurer les données.

trans-unit.source: Receive notifications about the protection status of their agent.

seg-source.mrk: Receive notifications about the protection status of their agent.

target.mrk: Recevoir des notifications sur l'état de protection de leur agent.

trans-unit.source: Once the administrator fills in the e-mail on the server side, it can no longer be modified on the agent. See <MadCap:xref href="Assigning_email_address_to_agent.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Assigning an Email Address to the Agent</MadCap:xref> for details.

seg-source.mrk: Once the administrator fills in the e-mail on the server side, it can no longer be modified on the agent.
See <MadCap:xref href="Assigning_email_address_to_agent.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Assigning an Email Address to the Agent</MadCap:xref> for details.

target.mrk: Une fois que l'administrateur a rempli l'e-mail côté serveur, il ne peut plus être modifié par l'agent.

Voir <MadCap:xref href="Assigning_email_address_to_agent.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Assigning an Email Address to the Agent</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

seg-source.mrk: CDP type

target.mrk: Type de CDP

trans-unit.source: For example OS File System Events or the Driver providing a way for <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> to request notifications that allow to quickly detect and backup modified files.

seg-source.mrk: For example OS File System Events or the Driver providing a way for <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> to request notifications that allow to quickly detect and backup modified files.

target.mrk: Par exemple, les événements du système de fichiers du système d'exploitation ou le pilote fournissent un moyen pour <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> de demander des notifications qui permettent de détecter et de sauvegarder rapidement les fichiers modifiés.
